MatchedRegions.transcript: However, even if there exists meaningful patterns in the training data, the DNM may still not learn these concepts.
A typical example is when the task can be conducted with some shortcut solutions.

MatchedRegion.Text: Failure case 3: When the task has a simple shortcut solution

MatchedRegions.transcript: In this case, the DNM probably converges to the shortcut solution, without encoding complex concepts.
